item.title: What if money expired?
item.description: First, an interesting book is coming, The dream you ordered is sold out what if money expired? There is an interesting article on money. Below are some notes. Bartering is inconvenient because it requires “double coincidence of wants.” This makes it highly inefficient too. As it evolved, money became increasingly symbolic. Money is abstract. It’s a belief system, a language, a social contract. Money is trust. But the rules aren’t written in stone.
